Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2018 07:37PM Daisy110679 wrote: Hello, I’ve just completed my 4th CMF treatment out of 8. I am loosing sooo much hair. I feel like after this one I’ve lost the most amount of hair. I do still have some left but other people i have spoken to have said they didn’t lose much hair but I am losing sooo much. Did anyone else have this? Does the hair grow back at all while I’m having treatment. At this rate of hair loss, I’m pretty sure I won’t have any hair left by the 8th treatment. Can anyone offer advice or have similar situations? My doctor swears she’s never had a patient lose all of their hair on CMF but I’m beginning to think I may Be her first.
Posts.Title: CMF treatment survivors and experiences 19501952 2002chickadee
